verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Amani yake Bwana,
amani yake Bwana.
Amani yake Bwana
Amani iwe nawe.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Upendo wake Bwana,
upendo wake Bwana.
Upendo wake Bwana
upendo uwe nawe.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Baraka yake Bwana,
baraka yake Bwana.
Baraka yake Bwana
Baraka iwe nawe.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Fadhili zake Bwana,
fadhili zake Bwana.
Fadhili zake Bwana
Fadhili ziwe nawe.

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
Faraja yake Bwana,
faraja yake Bwana.
Faraja yake Bwana
faraja iwe nawe.

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
Umoja wake Bwana,
umoja wake Bwana.
Umoja wake Bwana
umoja uwe nawe.
